ee mahatha mebawa pawasuwe surabadu departhamenthuwata adalawa 2019 warshaya sadaha wu wiganadhipathi warthawa saha warthamana karya sadhanaya pilibada wimasa balima sadaha mahacharya thissa witharana mahathage pradhanathwayen rajaye ginum pilibada karaka sabhawa raswu awasthawediya.surabadu departhamenthuwa, regu departhamenthuwa saha deshiya aadayam departhumenthuwa ekinekata sambandha wana parighanaka paddhathiyak sakasima sambandhayen 2019 wasaredi pawathi kopa kamitu raswimawakadi nirdesha labadi thibunada eya me dakwa kriyathmaka kara nothibima pilibadawa karaka sabhawedi dirgha lesa sakachchawata lakwi thibenawa.thawada departhamenthuwe surabadu aadayama gananaya kirime kriyawaliya niwaradi kirimata adalawa parighanaka mrudukanga paddhathiyak kriyathmaka kirime awashyathawa da kamituwa awadharanaya kala athara  2016 warshaye sita 2018 warshaya sadaha ayawaya saha paripuraka  magin prathipadana wen wi thibunada ema wyapruthiya nisi lesa kriyathmaka wi nothibima pilibadawa da awadhanaya mehidi yomu wuna.
